CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(NokiaProductAccreditation__r.NokiaCPQ_Incoterm__c, 'FCA Free Carrier') , NokiaCPQ_ShippingLocation__r.Shipping_Location__c, (
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus_Proposal__Account__r.BillingCity)), Apttus_Proposal__Account__r.BillingCity + ',', NULL) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus_Proposal__Account__r.BillingState)), Apttus_Proposal__Account__r.BillingState + ',' , NULL)+ IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Apttus_Proposal__Account__r.BillingCountry)),Apttus_Proposal__Account__r.BillingCountry , NULL) ) )
CustomField.label: Shipping Location
